name: Splatz! - A Dimension Change Project
description:
Splatz! is a Dimension Change project where the mechanics of Splatoon have been recreated in 2D!

Click to Spray
R to Refill
E to change modes

Collect Coins to win!

Solo game jam entry by Conor McKenna.
You can see more of my work here, including more about CyberThreat, an upcoming modern day indie RPG:

http://cyberthreatgame.com/
https://twitter.com/cyberthreatgame
